elements.content: From isolated to 2D coordination polymers based on 6-aminonicotinate and 3d-metal ions: towards field-induced single-ion-magnets† Antonio Rodríguez-Diéguez Sonia Pérez-Yáñez Leire Ruiz-Rubio Jose M. Seco and Javier Cepeda sql1234567891010,11127c,13141516Dimeric entity and crystallization 6ani anions of compound 1 showing the coordination environment around Mn1 atoms and supramolecular interactions (single dotted orange lines: hydrogen bonds; double dotted lines: π–π interactions). Colour coding: C = grey, H = pink, N = blue, O = red, M = green.

Dimeric entity and crystallization 6ani anions of compound 1 showing the coordination environment around Mn1 atoms and supramolecular interactions (single dotted orange lines: hydrogen bonds; double dotted lines: π-π interactions). Colour coding: C = grey, H = pink, N = blue, O = red, M = green.

elements.content: Fig. 1 Dimeric entity and crystallization 6ani anions of compound 1 showing the coordination environment around Mn1 atoms and supramolecular interactions (single dotted orange lines: hydrogen bonds; double dotted lines: π–π interactions). Colour coding: C = grey, H = pink, N = blue, O = red, M = green.
